/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the blend of modern and traditional styles that are characteristic of Beijing. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a striking contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. In the distance, power lines crisscross the sky, adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the cityscape.
